header.description: No header dataset required — this report contains no scalar tokens.

rows.description: One row per schema field, listing the schema ID, key name, data type, unit, scale, and description.

totals.description: No totals dataset required — this report contains no totals tokens.

semantics: All tokens are direct column pass-throughs. No filtering, no parameter substitution, no aggregations.
transformations: No transformations required. Each row token maps directly to a source column in app_schema_fields.
